item.description:
A spring stroll through Boston’s two great parks for the people. Learn about the history of this green and precious heritage: a struggle for beauty and preservation against daunting odds. We will experience the sculpture, the ornamental plantings, the ponds, and the birds—all within the heart of the bustling city.

Rain or shine, no reservations necessary. $15/person.
item.how_to_find_us: Steps of the Massachusetts State House, Beacon and Park Streets
item.name: Boston Common and the Public Garden
